REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0334 reute u f BC-GATX-<GMT>-TO-REPURCH 03-06 0050

TEXT.TITLE: GATX <GMT> TO REPURCHASE UP TO 750,000 SHARES
TEXT.BODY: GATX Corp said it will buy back up to 750,000 common shares in the open market from time to time within the next year. Morgan Stanley and Co Inc will act as agent. As of December 31, 1986, GATX had nine mln shares outstanding. Reuter
